Title: Fruits Basket: Prelude
Description: ['The film will serve as an omnibus to the three-season anime series, including the ', Kyouko to Katsuya no Monogatari, ' (', The Story of Kyouko and Katsuya, ') prequel, as well as new scenes written by the original creator Natsuki Takaya taking place after the television anime.', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' (Source: MAL News)']
